explanation: [0-0] A young boy stands in front of a goal in his backyard, his hands pointing upwards. The goal features photos of five famous football stars: Lewandowski, Salah, Benzema, Messi, and Mbappe. White subtitles appear at the top of the screen.
[0-6] The boy then swings his arms as the camera pans from right to left, showcasing individual photos of Lewandowski, Salah, Benzema, and Messi.
